name: h3
description: Discover the 2025 DeMarini CF Drop 9 Fastpitch Softball Bat, designed for exceptional performance on the field. This balanced bat features a two-piece composite construction, offering a massive sweet spot and enhanced responsiveness thanks to its Paraflex Plus Composite material. With a 2 1/4 inch barrel diameter and a 0.800" handle, it effectively dampens vibrations while transferring energy to the barrel through its Type V Connection Point. The Tracer End Cap boosts bat speed, while its eye-catching white, purple, and yellow colorway ensures you stand out. Certified by USSSA, USA Softball (ASA), NSA, ISA, and WBSC, this bat is ready for competitive play. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included.
